text: The 2019 Women's U-19 European Handball Championship was the twelfth edition of the European Women's U-19 Handball Championship, held in Győr, Hungary from 11 to 21 July 2019. == Qualification == {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="width: 250px;" | Competition ! Dates ! Host ! Vacancies ! Qualified |- | Women’s 17 EHF EURO 2017 | 10–20 August 2017 | Michalovce | style="text- align: center;" | 14 | |- | rowspan=2 | Women’s 17 EHF Championship 2017 | 31 July – 6 August 2017 | Skopje | style="text-align: center;" | 1 | |- | 14–20 August 2017 | Klaipėda | style="text-align: center;" | 1 | |} == Draw == The draw was held on 26 February 2019 in Győr. {| class="wikitable" width=50% |- ! style="width: 25%;" | Pot 1 ! style="width: 25%;" | Pot 2 ! style="width: 25%;" | Pot 3 ! style="width: 25%;" | Pot 4 |- | | | | |} == Preliminary round == All times are local (UTC+2). === Group A === \---- \---- === Group B === \---- \---- === Group C === \---- \---- === Group D === \---- \---- == Intermediate round == === Group III === \---- === Group IV === \---- == Main round == === Group I === \---- === Group II === \---- == Final round == === Bracket === ;Championship bracket ;9th place bracket ;5th place bracket ;13th place bracket === 13–16th place semifinals === === 9–12th place semifinals === === 5–8th place semifinals === === Semifinals === === 15th place game === === 13th place game === === Eleventh place game === === Ninth place game === === Seventh place game === === Fifth place game === === Third place game === === Final === == Final ranking == {|class=wikitable style="text-align: center;" |- !
